channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024010440
item.description:
Report X-2024010440

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN PACKAGE ARRIVED IT WAS SOILED DUE TO A LOOSE CAP SOILING BOX DescribePack: PACKAGE HAD A LOOSE CAP CAUSING LIQUID TO LEAK ON ONE WHOLE SIDE OF THE BOX DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED THEN PLACED INTO A HAZMAT TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024010170
item.description:
Report X-2024010170

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Upon inspection of the package outer layer of said package had corroded due to the contact of the contents of the package. DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Proper and prompt in house cleaning
